attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: National Naked Tuesday (N.N.T) would represent a glorious chance to explore the beauty of the human body. It would demonstrate equality and also show the country how fortunate we our with all our modern devices and appliances, from clothes to cars. We feel N.N.T would create a light hearted atmosphere and would be a chance to help de-stress and reduce feelings of anxiety.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
